issues.message: Add "lang" and/or "xml:lang" attributes to this "<html>" element
Remove the declaration of thrown exception 'java.io.IOException', as it cannot be thrown from method's body.
Same expression in both branches of ternary operator.
Replace the type specification in this constructor call with the diamond operator ("<>"). (sonar.java.source not set. Assuming 7 or greater.)
Do not use "undefined" to declare a parameter - use another name.
The return type of this method should be an interface such as "List" rather than the implementation "ArrayList".
Add "lang" and/or "xml:lang" attributes to this "<html>" element
Add a private constructor to hide the implicit public one.
Add "lang" and/or "xml:lang" attributes to this "<html>" element
Define and throw a dedicated exception instead of using a generic one.
